__e: Still, seems like I've got a long ways to go.
Somewhere along the way, I seem to have lost my husband.
Don't look at me, I'm sometimes lost inside my head and it makes me look upset.
I seem to be doing all the work, Tim.
I brought yousome groceries, 'cause, you know, I seem to be the only onearound here-- mary, hi!

He won't even take the 500 bucks for the date.

Do you think you could pay me in smaller bills?
